title: Deck holding 100 people collapses at Miami sports bar
paragraphs: (CNN) – One moment, dozens of sports bar patrons were cheering the Miami Heat as they watched the NBA finals on a deck above South Florida’s Biscayne Bay on Thursday night.
The next – just as they stood to cheer a Heat basket, a hostess recalled – the packed deck collapsed, spilling them into water.
About 100 people were on the deck of Shuckers Bar & Grill at the time of the collapse, Miami-Dade Fire Lt. Eugene Germain told reporters.
READ MORE: Packed restaurant deck collapses into Florida bay
